name: R-Type Command
description:
Classic R-Type® Returns With Intense Tactics Gameplay
In a desperate war against the mysterious alien race known as the Bydo, humanity sends wave after wave of fighters into Bydo space-none of whom are ever heard from again. Mankind's main hope now resides with a lone commander, leading a small armada into the heart of the Bydo Empire. Re-enter the war between humans and Bydo as the famed R-Type® series is reborn with intense strategy gameplay. Choose from nearly 100 different units to create your best fleet as you take part in hex-based tactical warfare—and for the first time in the series, take command of the Bydo forces as they launch their assault on Earth!
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
